channel.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command
channel.description:
Hi when i try and run or compile my server i get this error
[code]Compiling Server 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What should i do?
my Classpath is [code].;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6_0_16\lib\ext\QTJava.zip[/code] and my path is [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\ [/code]

item.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

sorry i put 13 i meant 16 :S

Read full topic
